artiano.math.algebra

类 GaussJordan

  • java.lang.Object
    • artiano.math.algebra.GaussJordan

  • public class GaussJordan
extends java.lang.Object

    Description: Solve the matrix equation like A*x = B.

    This class for solve the matrix equation like A*x = b, x is the solution. You can write the code like this:


    //A*x = B

    double[][] A = {{...},{...},...};

    double[][] b = {{...},{...},...};

    GaussJordan g = new GaussJordan(A, B, false); //assume don't reserve

    double[][] inversion = g.getInversion(); //get the inversion of A

    double[][] solution = g.getSolution(); //get the solution
    ...
    从以下版本开始:
    1.0
    版本:
    1.0.0
    作者:
    Nano.Michael, (latest modification by Nano.Michael)

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明

    • 构造器详细资料

      • GaussJordan

        public GaussJordan(Matrix a,
           Matrix b,
           boolean reserve)
        constructor
        参数:
        a - - coefficient matrix
        b - - constant matrix
        reserve - - to indicate reserve the A and b whether or not, if reserve is not true, the matrix A will be replaced with the inversion of A, and the matrix B will replaced with the solution matrix

      • GaussJordan

        public GaussJordan(Matrix a,
           Matrix b)
